channel.title: Mnemonics on By the Sea
channel.description: Recent content in Mnemonics on By the Sea

item.title: Viral taxonomy. Some mnemonics
item.description: DNA Viruses Generally: ds DNA, icosahedral symmetry, replicate in the nucleus (where DNA is normally found). Of them: Three viruses are naked. Papova, Adeno, Parvo (“Woman naked for PAP smear exam”). Parvo is so simple it has a single DNA strand. SS Linear DNA. It’s also naked hence simple. “One Par Golf”. “A golf bat is linear and single stranded”. (22nm only, one of the smallest). “Pox in a box”.
